childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Shapes from shape sorter
  • Cotton reels
  • Plastic cars
  • Building bricks
  • Shallow painting trays or disposable lids from containers
  • Plain paper
  • Paint

Children's toys are ideal to use for printing. The different items can give a variety of effects and if plastic toys are used it is easy to wash the the paint off.

Squeeze a different colour paint on each tray and allow your child to explore and experiment with the different objects to make a variety of patterns.

Talk about the colours and objects used and the patterns that the child creates.
